name: Effective Detective
description:
Four retired cops miss the old days of studying clues and interrogating people. On one of their boy's nights, they decide to relive those days through a silly scenario of "Who ate the last doughnut?!"

Effective Detective is a cute and silly mystery game where the player studies clues, sometimes in the form of playing mini-games and interrogating the suspects before deciding who the doughnut thief is.

This game was meant to be a fun and childish experience, mainly aimed at anyone looking for an easy and somewhat funny experience.

Date: July 2021
